intro.heading: Mishin's coil is your home doctor
intro.subheading: Device for the treatment of most diseases at home
intro.textBlock1: Mishin's coil helps to get rid of hypertension, kidney diseases, arrhythmia, VVD, tonsillitis and other illnesses.
intro.textBlock2: The technology has 6 main advantages: no side effects; treats most diseases; one device for the whole life; treats at home; compact, so it can be taken on a trip; easy to use.

textBlock3.mainText: We will tell you about how Mishin's coil works without delving deeply into the physics of the processes. If you are well versed in physics, watch
